summary: RIGHT SPINDLE WAS BENT AND BOTH SIDES OF AXLE SHOWED EVIDENCE OF BOTTOMING OUT. *LA               MECHANIC WAS GOING TO REPLACE THE AXLE WITH A 5 THOUSAND POUND RATED AXLE AND RIMS OR APPROXIMATELY. $700. DOLLARS. CONSUMER WAS INFORMED THE WARRANTY DIDN'T COVER DAMAGED CAUSED BY OVERLOADING. CONSUMER LEARNED THE PROBLEM WAS NOT ENOUGH SPACING BETWEEN THE AXLE AND FRAME OF THE TRAILER OF 1.5 INCHES. CONSUMER WOULD LIKE A FULL REFUND FOR THE PURCHASE OF THE TRAILER (ROADMASTER RMU61ZSA).   *PH    *NM
